name: Goblin Grand Prix! - A mobile game inspired by RoboRally
blurb: Turn-based racing & demolition for iOS, inspired by RoboRally! Play online or on a single iPad/iPhone!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Minimalist Goblin - just the barebones! a copy of Goblin Grand Prix for iOS with no additional backer rewards.
Early Goblin! = Beta access + all $15 level rewards at this special early adopter price.
Goblin = A copy of the game for iOS and all launch content, including an exclusive Kickstarter skin and avatar! Also get a free copy of Shifts, our first game!
Early Senior Goblin = Beta access + all $25 level rewards at this special early adopter price.
Senior Goblin = A digital copy of the soundtrack, as well as a second Kickstarter exclusive skin and avatar! Includes all rewards from previous levels.
Early Racer = Beta access + all $40 level rewards at this special early adopter price.
Racer = Two maps exclusive to this Kickstarter, never to be offered again! A third kickstarter exclusive skin and avatar! An exclusive art ebook! Includes all rewards from previous levels.
Early Dapper Goblin = Beta access + early adopter $65 price point.
Dapper Goblin = A Goblin Grand Prix t-shirt! An exclusive powerup, never to be offered again! Includes all rewards from previous levels.
Early Goblin Legacy = Beta access + early adopter $100 price point.

Goblin Legacy = Full unlock forever! At this point, you'll get all the Kickstarter exclusive content, and free access to any additional skins, maps and powerups that we put out! Forever! (And ever and ever and ever!) Includes all rewards from previous levels.
Early Extremely Dapper Goblin = Beta access + early adopter $175 price point.
Extremely Dapper Goblin = A Goblin Grand Prix backer hoodie! Includes all rewards from previous levels.

Goblin Hobnobber = Invitation to exclusive kickstarter backer game night - Come to Oakland and game with us for a night. We're aiming to do this close to our submission date! (You must provide your own travel/accomodations to Oakland.) (add $10 for non-US shipping of shirt/hoodie)

Goblin In Memoria = Get a goblin in our game in your likeness! - Give us a reference photo and our artists will transform you into an avatar image for use in Goblin Grand Prix! (Subject to our approval, obviously. Just to be safe.)

Goblin Architect = Design a map! - Work with our team to concept out a map, and put it together. We'll even name it after you! (Subject to our approval, obviously. It's not that we don't trust you...)

Goblin Weaponsmith = Design a powerup! - Work with our team to design a powerup for the game to be included in a future expansion! (Subject to our approval, obviously. ...but obviously we need to screen things)

Goblin Mastercraftsman = Design a golem! - Work with our team to design a golem for the game! Concept it out with us and we'll make your vision a reality and get it into our game! (Subject to our approval, obv. obv.)

Goblin Golem Franchise Owner = Sponsor a golem team - Give a team an identity based on yourself or your company, design a golem, add your company's name to the team name, add your company's logo to the golem. (We may also have mock advertising lining the walls of the game arenas - if so, your company's logo/ad will be added to the ones randomly displayed, just like real sporting arenas!) (Subject to our approval, obviously. CLEARLY.)

Goblin Marketer  = Your game in More Games - Want to generate more awareness for your game? Get included in the "More games" section of ours! We are only offering three slots in this! (Subject to our approval. Like you didn't already know that.)

Goblin DaVinci = Design a goblin franchise of your very own - give us a golem concept, a goblin concept, a powerup concept, a map design and a map THEME (that's right - pick/design a setting for the map of your choosing!) We'll also let you name the team, and come up with the team's logo, and we'll design an ad of your choosing for the billboards lining the arenas (when we get there). You will have your fingers on every aspect of the game we can give you! (Subject to our approval. You did know that, right?)

Big Daddy Goblinbucks = Breakfast cooked by a team member! At your house! In an apron (if you want)! Travel is on us! We'll fly one of our team members anywhere in the US or Canada, make you breakfast (cooking quality varies from team member to team member), give you a private demo of the game, as well as everything included in every level above. Hell, we'll even hand-deliver your t-shirt and hoodie while we're at it!
